abstract: French Prime Min Manuel Valls reaffirms country is hosting soccer's European Championship scheduled for June 2016, despite recent terror attacks in Paris and Brussels.
lead_paragraph: The French prime minister, Manuel Valls, said it was “vital” to stage the European Championship in France to show that the country would not cower in the wake of the recent terror attacks in Brussels and Paris.

headline.main: France Insists on Being Host to European Championship

snippet: The French prime minister, Manuel Valls, said it was “vital” to stage the European Championship in France to show that the country would not cower in the wake of the recent terror attacks in Brussels and Paris.
